content: this easy pattern was developed following the popularity of the three dozen apple bag 1 which is worked on a 20 0mm hook this version is worked on a 10 0mm hook i have used jute but it would work equally as well using a bulky cotton or a couple of strands of dk cotton worked together or even fabric strips experiment with different materials 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/the-three-dozen-apple-bag
